Package ohos.agp.components

Class AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
      • ohos.agp.components.AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    AdaptiveBoxLayout

    public static class AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig
extends ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
    Defines layout parameters for child components in an AdaptiveBoxLayout instance, including their width, height, margins, and gravity.
    Since:
    1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int alignment
      Indicates the alignment value of a component.

      • Fields inherited from class ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig

        height, MATCH_CONTENT, MATCH_PARENT, width

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LayoutConfig​()
      Default constructor used to create an AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance by setting the width and height to the default value MATCH_CONTENT.
      LayoutConfig​(int width, int height)
      A constructor used to create an AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance by specifying the width and height.
      LayoutConfig​(int width, int height, int alignment)
      A constructor used to create an AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance by specifying the width, height, and gravity.
      LayoutConfig​(AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig source)
      A constructor used to create an AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance by extracting width, height, margin, and gravity settings from an existing instance.
      LayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig source)
      A constructor used to create an AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance by extracting width, height, and margin settings from an existing instance.
      LayoutConfig​(Context context, AttrSet attrSet)
      A constructor used to create a AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance based on the context and attribute set.

      • Methods inherited from class ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig

    • Field Detail

      • alignment

        public int alignment
        Indicates the alignment value of a component. Only supports horizontal orientation.
        See Also:
        LayoutAlignment

    • Constructor Detail

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​()
        Default constructor used to create an AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance by setting the width and height to the default value MATCH_CONTENT.

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(int width,
                    int height)
        A constructor used to create an AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance by specifying the width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - Indicates the width, which can be a specific value, ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT, or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        height - Indicates the height, which can be a specific value, ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT, or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(int width,
                    int height,
                    int alignment)
        A constructor used to create an AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance by specifying the width, height, and gravity.
        Parameters:
        width - Indicates the width, which can be a specific value, ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT, or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        height - Indicates the height, which can be a specific value, ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT, or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        alignment - Indicates the alignment value.

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(Context context,
                    AttrSet attrSet)
        A constructor used to create a AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance based on the context and attribute set.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        attrSet - Indicates the attribute set to be used.

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig source)
        A constructor used to create an AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance by extracting width, height, and margin settings from an existing instance.
        Parameters:
        source - Indicates the parameters of the existing instance.

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig source)
        A constructor used to create an AdaptiveBoxLayout.LayoutConfig instance by extracting width, height, margin, and gravity settings from an existing instance.
        Parameters:
        source - Indicates the parameters of the existing instance.
